description: 96-Prompt Engineering Roadmap for automated GitHub issue creation

top_needs.title: Modernize Build & CI/CD
top_needs.detail:
Modernize the build system and CI/CD pipelines with GitHub Actions workflows, lint/test pipelines, branch protection rules, and build metrics dashboard.

**Category**: Infrastructure & Deployment
**Wave**: 1 (Foundation)
**Priority**: P0 - Critical

**Artifacts**:
- [ ] GitHub Actions workflows (ci.yml, cd.yml, release.yml)
- [ ] Lint/test/build pipelines with caching
- [ ] Branch protection rules configuration
- [ ] CODEOWNERS file with team mappings
- [ ] Build metrics dashboard

**Acceptance Criteria**:
- Build time reduced by 40%
- All quality gates enforced before merge
- Results cached for subsequent runs

top_needs.title: Expand Automated Test Coverage
top_needs.detail:
Achieve comprehensive test coverage across unit, integration, and E2E layers with mutation testing and coverage enforcement.

**Category**: Quality & Testing
**Wave**: 1 (Foundation)
**Priority**: P0 - Critical

**Artifacts**:
- [ ] Unit test suites for all services (Jest)
- [ ] Integration test suites with database fixtures
- [ ] E2E test suites (Playwright)
- [ ] Coverage reports with thresholds (>80%)
- [ ] Mutation testing reports (Stryker)

**Acceptance Criteria**:
- Unit test coverage ≥80%
- Integration test coverage ≥70%
- Mutation score ≥60%

top_needs.title: Dependency & Security Audit
top_needs.detail:
Comprehensive audit of all dependencies with vulnerability remediation, license compliance, and automated scanning.

**Category**: Security & Compliance
**Wave**: 1 (Foundation)
**Priority**: P0 - Critical

**Artifacts**:
- [ ] Dependency tree documentation
- [ ] Vulnerability remediation report
- [ ] License compliance matrix
- [ ] Automated scanning configuration (Snyk, Dependabot)
- [ ] SBOM generation pipeline

**Acceptance Criteria**:
- Zero critical vulnerabilities
- Zero high vulnerabilities (or documented exceptions)
- All licenses compliant with policy

top_needs.title: Database Schema Evolution
top_needs.detail:
Establish robust database migration frameworks for PostgreSQL and Neo4j with version tracking and rollback capabilities.

**Category**: APIs & Data
**Wave**: 1 (Foundation)
**Priority**: P0 - Critical

**Artifacts**:
- [ ] PostgreSQL migration framework (Prisma/Knex)
- [ ] Neo4j migration framework (custom scripts)
- [ ] Schema version tracking system
- [ ] Rollback procedures documentation
- [ ] Data validation scripts

top_needs.title: Documentation Overhaul

- All APIs documented with examples

top_needs.title: Performance Optimization
top_needs.detail:

- [ ] Optimization implementations
- [ ] Performance regression tests
- [ ] Benchmark dashboards

**Acceptance Criteria**:
- API P95 latency <200ms
- Graph queries complete <500ms

top_needs.title: Security Hardening
top_needs.detail:
Implement comprehensive security hardening including input validation, authentication flows, and static analysis.

**Category**: Security & Compliance
**Wave**: 1 (Foundation)
**Priority**: P0 - Critical

**Artifacts**:
- [ ] Input validation middleware (Zod schemas)
- [ ] Authentication flow hardening (OIDC/JWT)
- [ ] Static analysis configuration (CodeQL, Semgrep)
- [ ] Security headers middleware
- [ ] Rate limiting implementation

**Acceptance Criteria**:
- No OWASP Top 10 vulnerabilities
- Security headers score A+

1.name: Foundation
1.description: Establish core infrastructure, testing, security, and documentation foundations

2.name: Expansion
2.description: Expand observability, API design, architecture, and compliance capabilities

3.name: Resilience
3.description: Build resilience, distributed systems readiness, and developer experience

4.name: Advanced
4.description: Implement microservices, ML integration, and advanced infrastructure

5.name: Innovation
5.description: Implement advanced ML, predictive capabilities, and next-generation features

6.name: Excellence
6.description: Achieve operational excellence, organizational maturity, and long-term sustainability
